nodes.text: The ScanMaster Arm was a model of cyberscanner arm made by the companies Neuro-Saav Corporation and Fabritech and sold for 4000. The cybernetic limb was available in the period following the Battle of Yavin during the Galactic Civil War between the Galactic Empire and the Alliance to Restore the Republic.
The ScanMaster Arm was first mentioned in the Star Wars: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook released by Fantasy Flight Games in 2013 and written by Sterling Hershey.
